attributes.review: Other than obvious issues, the app actually did randomly make my phone shut down multiple times.
attributes.title: Very glitchy

attributes.review: i got scared when i opened this app because i saw an orange oompa loompa appear on my screen as soon as i opened the app. the government should be taken seriously and not put this creature on the app as a joke, because it isn’t funny!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL!!!

attributes.review: after taking a week to download this app constantly crashed, slowed my phone down and took up WAY TOO MUCH STORAGE. it must be taken down so tell that 🍊orange🍊he has bigger things to worry abt than banning tik tok
attributes.title: This app is awful

attributes.review: He needs to stop taking an app down that a lot of people use a lot of people on that app are making jobs Bc of it he needs to keep TikTok on as an app.
attributes.title: He is taking an app that could make jobs one day

attributes.review: I was very excited to get the app! Then it all went down hill when I opened it 🧚‍♂️ it’s very disappointing, disorganized, and borderline not good. Don’t get the app it’s not worth it yall ❣️ I’m very disappointed in our president, or orange 🧡Oki Chile anyways this app ain’t it.
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: It’s the worst app you could ever get because it’s really scary also trump makes you like him which gives me even less respect for him, overall I think it’s the worst app ever and people need to NEVER get it. 0/10 😳🤡😤🤢🤮🤧😷😾👿👺💩🙅🏿‍♂️🙅🏾‍♀️
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I first downloaded this app as a joke with low expectations. As soon as the app opened i knew it didn’t even come close to my expectations. This is easily no problem the worst app I have ever used.
attributes.title: Worst app I have Ever Used

attributes.review: This app keeps crashing my phone and I can deal with a little, but when it happens every time I open the app it's ridiculous.
attributes.title: Keeps crashing my phone

attributes.review: WORST APP EVERR!!!! It took forever to download, and when I got it, this picture of an Oompa Loompa popped up? I’m not sure what this has to do with trump but I don’t like it. Very laggy, doesn’t give updates about the wall, and very badly decorated app!!!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! It’s not worth your time
attributes.title: Tik tok😍😍

attributes.review: Hello, this app is terrible. Took 2 weeks to download and it was so glitchy when I opened the app. And it barely tell’s you much I find it a waste of space in this app. Can’t wait for it to be deleted.
